title: Venice Vampires 7: An Erotic Paranormal Romance
description: Just when Emily thinks she and Luc can finally be together, they are torn apart by a dangerous force. As Emily is held captive by another vampire who lusts after her blood, she must also resist the temptations that threaten to keep her apart from Luc forever. Is her love for Luc strong enough to keep them together? Can she trust him to save her before it is too late?VENICE VAMPIRES 7 is the seventh and final installment in the erotic short story romance series, VENICE VAMPIRES, by Emma Rose.
author: Emma  Rose
